title: Outcome Evaluation
description: Schema for recording verified outcomes of decisions to enable bounded learning.

decisionId.description: Unique identifier of the decision being evaluated.

expectedOutcome.description: The outcome the system predicted or aimed for.

deltaExplanation.description: Human or automated analysis of the difference between expected and actual.

eligibilityForLearning.description: Whether this outcome is valid for training/adaptation.

verificationSource.description: Identity of the verifier (User ID, Trusted System ID).

confidenceDelta.description: The calculated impact on system confidence (-1.0 to 1.0).
